alert.note: Alert for Labette; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 12:53AM CDT until April 30 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Labette County in southeastern Kansas... Southeastern Montgomery County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 1252 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Parsons to near Dearing, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Parsons, Coffeyville, Oswego, Chetopa, Altamont, Edna, Dearing, Mound Valley, Liberty, Bartlett, Labette, Angola, Coffeyville Airport and Big Hill Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
